entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
